actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to disregard section 212 (a)(15) of the Immigration and Nationality Act when the applicant for a visa is the alien spouse or child of a U.S. citizen or permanent resident, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Disregards specified provisions relating to paupers under the Immigration and Nationality Act when the visa applicant is the alien spouse or child of a United States citizen or permanent resident. (Adds 8 U.S.C. 1182(j))

titles.title: A bill to disregard section 212 (a)(15) of the Immigration and Nationality Act when the applicant for a visa is the alien spouse or child of a U.S. citizen or permanent resident, and for other purposes.
